title: Work of Baker in Black Freedom- highlight of issue

content.question: Baker’s work during the Black Freedom movement highlighted which of the following?

choices.label: The need for a moderate approach to advance the movement’s cause
The importance of Black women’s leadership in the efforts to secure equality
The belief that African Americans should emigrate from the United States to Africa
The decision to pursue Black autonomy instead of prioritizing integration

content.answer: The importance of Black women’s leadership in the efforts to secure equality

topic.text: 4.7: Black Women's Leadership and Grassroots Organizing in the Civil Rights Movement

skill.text: 1.A: Identify and explain course concepts, developments, and processes.
